sense.name: person who plays an offense role on a sports team
sense.examples: John is the best forward on the basketball team. The hockey forwards were all large, tall guys.

sense.name: an offense position in a sports game
sense.examples: He usually plays forward in soccer. The coach pulled John from forward and assigned Bill to it.

sense.name: an obligatory financial contract with settlement on a specified future date
sense.examples: The investor bought some forwards as a cover for his future contracts. A forward is an obligatory contract that must be exercised, unlike an option.
